scripts.fonts:build: mkdir -p dist/fonts-svg && pnpm fonts:generate:svg && pnpm fonts:optimize:svg && mkdir -p dist/fonts && pnpm fonts:generate:font-regular && pnpm fonts:generate:font-filled && pnpm replace '\\\\\\' '0x' dist/fonts/*.json && pnpm replace '\\\\' '0x' dist/fonts/*.json
scripts.fonts:generate:font-filled: icon-font-generator dist/fonts-svg/*_filled.svg -o dist/fonts --name AxisSystemIcons-Filled --types ttf --codepoints fonts/AxisSystemIcons-Filled.json --height 500
scripts.fonts:generate:font-regular: icon-font-generator dist/fonts-svg/*_regular.svg -o dist/fonts --name AxisSystemIcons-Regular --types ttf --codepoints fonts/AxisSystemIcons-Regular.json --height 500
scripts.fonts:optimize:svg: find dist/fonts-svg -type f -name '*.svg' -exec pnpm svgo --config svgo_config.yml '{}' +
scripts.react:build: mkdir -p dist/react-svg && pnpm react:generate:svg && pnpm react:svg:optimize && pnpm react:svg:unfill && pnpm react:generate:react
scripts.react:deploy: mkdir -p src && pnpm react:build && cp -a dist/react/* src && biome format --write src
